Package StaffManagement

Class hospitalStaffManagement

Object
hospitalStaffManagement
All Implemented Interfaces:
StaffFilter, StaffManagementAdd, StaffManagementRemove, StaffManagementUpdate, StaffManagementView
public class hospitalStaffManagement extends Object implements StaffManagementAdd, StaffManagementUpdate, StaffManagementRemove, StaffManagementView, StaffFilter
The hospitalStaffManagement class implements the StaffManagementAdd, StaffManagementUpdate, StaffManagementRemove, and StaffManagementView interfaces, providing functionality for managing hospital staff records. It allows for adding, removing, updating, and viewing staff information with filtering capabilities.
Since:
2024-11-6
Version:
1.0
Author:
Tan Guang Wei

  • Method Details

    • addStaff

      public boolean addStaff(String staffID, String staffName, String staffRole, String staffGender, int staffAge)
      Adds a new staff member to the staff list and create a user account. Checks if the staff ID already exists before adding.
      Specified by:
      addStaff in interface StaffManagementAdd
      Parameters:
      staffID - The ID of the staff member.
      staffName - The name of the staff member.
      staffRole - The role of the staff member (e.g., Doctor, Nurse).
      staffGender - The gender of the staff member.
      staffAge - The age of the staff member.
      Returns:
      true if the staff was successfully added, false if the ID already exists.

    • removeStaff

      public boolean removeStaff(String staffID)
      Removes a staff member from the staff list and his user account based on the given staff ID.
      Specified by:
      removeStaff in interface StaffManagementRemove
      Parameters:
      staffID - The ID of the staff member to remove.
      Returns:
      true if the staff member was successfully removed, false if the staff ID was not found.

    • updateStaff

      public boolean updateStaff(String staffID, String staffName, String staffRole, String staffGender, int staffAge)
      Updates the information of an existing staff member in the staff list.
      Specified by:
      updateStaff in interface StaffManagementUpdate
      Parameters:
      staffID - The ID of the staff member to update.
      staffName - The updated name of the staff member.
      staffRole - The updated role of the staff member.
      staffGender - The updated gender of the staff member.
      staffAge - The updated age of the staff member.
      Returns:
      true if the staff member was successfully updated, false if the staff ID was not found.

    • filteredView

      public void filteredView(String category, String type)
      Displays a filtered list of staff based on a specific category and type. For example, this could display all staff with a specific role or gender.
      Specified by:
      filteredView in interface StaffFilter
      Specified by:
      filteredView in interface StaffManagementView
      Parameters:
      category - The category to filter by (e.g., "role", "gender").
      type - The specific value within the category to filter by (e.g., "Doctor", "Male").

    • getStaffByIndex

      private int getStaffByIndex(String staffID)
      Helper method to get staff by ID
      Parameters:
      staffID - The ID of the staff member to search for.
      Returns:
      The index of the staff member in the list, or -1 if not found.

    • getAccountByIndex

      private int getAccountByIndex(String staffID)
      Helper method to get account index using ID
      Parameters:
      staffID - The ID of the staff member to search for.
      Returns:
      The index of the staff member in the account list, or -1 if not found.

    • getFilterIndex

      private int getFilterIndex(String filter)
      Helper method to get filter index by category.
      Parameters:
      filter - The category name to search for (e.g., "role", "gender").
      Returns:
      The index of the category in the header row, or -1 if not found.
